tha-ap489:5.4: etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃ → etamatthamapucchu maṃ (bj); etamatthaṃ apucchisuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); etamatthaṃ apucchiṃsu (mr)
tha-ap489:6.1: Pulinena → puḷinena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | kato thūpo → kate thūpe (bj)
tha-ap489:7.1: Niddiṭṭhā nu → niddiṭṭhā no (bj, pts-vp-pli1); diṭṭhā no vo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap489:16.2: atulā ca → atulyā ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1); te (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap489:24.2: byādhinā → vyādhito (bj); byādhiko (sya1ed, sya2ed); byādhito (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
